item.title: How do security issues happen?
item.description: If you are a Windows user, you may be used to seeing a bunch of updates pop up around the second Tuesday of every month that purport to fix "critical security issues." Microsoft's continuous effort to fix these vulnerabilities in its operating system consumes a lot of resources, but it is well worth it to the users: in a world of ever-increasing cyber security threats, no hole in our computers' defenses should be left open to potential attackers.
